title: Worth the hike!!
text: This is a sight my friend and I had been wanting to see for a long time and it was definitely worth it, we went at the end of July and there were no queues for tickets so we were able to head straight in :) plus the walk up to the top was much easier than earlier thought - just remember to bring water

title: Welcoming staff
text: Staff was really welcoming, there was a limited range for vegetarians but my friend and I had two of the veggie dishes and they were delicious. After our meal we were also given some refreshing fruit on the house which was lovely :)

title: Great atmosphere
text: Really tasty burger, service was great and quick :) This place has a really good atmosphere and a nice place to cool down after walking in the sun

title: Brilliant
text: Really tasty food and lots of choice for vegetarians, very quick service and the staff were extremely friendly. My friend and I would definitely go again.
